column4: Organizational memberships in CLSI will be provided to CDC-Rwanda and/or NRL. CLSI membership includes full access to the CLSI document library; the opportunity to participate in the CLSI standards development process as delegate and associate delegates to CLSI working committees.  Invitations will be issued to attend the CLSI Annual LEadership Conference in Atlanta   GA-USA in March 2011.  Conference includes educational plenary sessions; tours to laboratories; participation in standards development area and sub-committee meetings.
